ë‚˜ì˜ í’€ì´

function solution(balls, share) {
  return Math.round(
    recursion(balls) / recursion(balls - share) / recursion(share)
  )
}

function recursion(n) {
  return n === 0 || n === 1 ? 1 : n * recursion(n - 1)
}
